items.sentence: The last time I saw Tom he was headed towards the beach.
The last time I saw Tom, he was ranting about something.
The man I met in the park told me that his name was Tom.
The man I was talking to earlier never told me his name.
The old lady lived in a three-room apartment by herself.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom wouldn\'t know how to do that.
I\'m sorry I couldn\'t make it to your party last night.
My brother would often stay up all night reading novels.
My older brother was the one who taught me how to drive.
If Tom had had something to throw, he\'d have thrown it.
